profile:
Serving customers in the GTA for over 50 year! 

With our extensive knowledge of cleaning and repair techniques, commitment to service and competitive pricing, we know that each of our customers will be proud to have us take care of their drapery, blind, carpet and upholstery cleaning. 

We provide a variety of service options including our popular and convenient in home full-service take down and rehanging, as well as in-store over the counter options. 

See the difference that clean draperies can make!

profile:
Yorkville Carpet Care was established in 1992 to fill a need for residential and commercial clients looking for superior carpet, upholstery and window treatment care by using environmentally safe and effective dry methods.

All of our cleaning systems are safe for children and pets, require very little drying time, and are recommended by all major carpet mills, quality furniture craftsmen, and high-end window treatment companies such as Hunter Douglasâ„¢.
service_area: Armour Heights, Beaches, Brampton, Bridle Path, Concord, East York, Etobicoke, Forest Hill, Hogs Hollow, Lawrence Park, Leaside, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Oakville, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Rosedale, Scarborough, Six Points, Thornhill, Toronto, Unionville, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Yorkville
services:
On-site carpet, upholstery and window covering cleaning. We clean the following, but are not limited to: broadloom, area rugs, stair runners, sofas, love seats, arm chairs, dining chairs, outdoor furniture cushions, blinds, drapes, venetians, floor grouts. 
We clean a variety of upholstery fabrics, including leather. Any type of window covering fabric in any configuration can be cleaned right where it hangs. We also apply fabric and carpet PROTECTION systems.
specialities: Hunter Douglas authorized cleaner, leather upholstery cleaning, area rug cleaning, grout cleaning.
payment_method: Cash, Cheque, Visa, MasterCard (Triple AirMiles Partner)
